ModMetaData.name: [WD] Expanded Artillery Continiued
ModMetaData.description:
A big content mod. Adds 3 new types of mortars and cannons, reasearches and recipes for them.
Orginally developed by Wemd, updated by LupineWitch. All rights and assets belong to the original author.
Original was removed from workshop. This will be unlisted and deleted on request of the original author. 
Contact me on discord: @lupinewitch

Updated: 23.12.2023
ModMetaData.author: Wemd
